Operations
==========

.. java:package:: mmlib4j.models.datastruct
   :noindex:

.. java:type:: public interface Operations

Fields
------

^^^^^^

.. java:field:: public static final NativeOperations NATIVE
   :outertype: Operations

NO_NATIVE
^^^^^^^^^

.. java:field:: public static final JavaOperations NO_NATIVE
   :outertype: Operations
